programme.title: Amazon River Islands: The Floating Forest
programme.desc: The Anavilhanas and Mariua archipelagos are deep in the heart of the Amazon rainforest. Flooded for 6 months of the year, the islands are home to some of the most unusual creatures in the world.

programme.title: Vancouver Island: Rivers of Life
programme.desc: Vancouver island is the largest island off the west coast of North America. Glaciers fuel some of Canada’s tallest waterfalls, and a network of rivers provide the ideal habitat for the pacific salmon.

programme.title: Philippines: Islands of Mystery
programme.desc: The Philippines are a chain of around 7,000 tropical islands in the Pacific. Plants-turned-predators line the edge of the forests, while rivers carve one of the world’s most spectacular cave systems.

programme.title: Falkland Islands: Penguin Paradise
programme.desc: 460 km from the South American mainland lies the Falkland archipelago. Rugged mountains and expansive coastline are a unique home for wildlife, including one of the most iconic flightless birds.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Circler
programme.desc: On the tip of Africa lives an elegant raptor whose Latin name means the "dark circler".

programme.title: Bama and the Lost Gorillas
programme.desc: Alfred Bama, an animal keeper from Cameroon, has an extraordinary connection with gorillas. “Nyango,” one of the gorillas he looks after, is the world's only Cross River gorilla in captivity. Until just a few years ago, this species was thought to be extinct. Now, Bama embarks on the greatest challenge of his life: locating Nyango’s family in the wild to protect them before it’s too late.

programme.title: Secrets of the Chesterfield Islands
programme.desc: French cinematographer Christian Pétron takes us on an extraordinary journey of discovery and adventure to unravel the secrets of the Chesterfield Islands. This scientific detective story follows a unique expedition to this remote coral archipelago in the South Pacific, and for the very first time, the stunning underwater world of the Chesterfield Islands is revealed.

programme.title: Flying Rivers
programme.desc: From the heart of the Amazon rain forest to our European laboratories, climatologists, biologists and chemists are exploring and are starting to understand a mystery: the central role of forests in cloud formation. Spectacular images will illustrate a strong ecological message and increase awareness of the danger that deforestation represents for our planet.

programme.title: The Wild Pacific
programme.desc: The Pacific ocean covers one third of our planet, more than all of the continents combined. For over 200 Million years, it has teemed with life, spawned new species, and launched global weather systems. This stunning work takes viewers into currents that swirl along kelp forests, coral reefs and seamounts, with sharks, whales, sea lions, vast schools of fish bursting from this ocean wilderness.

programme.title: Fur Kickers S1:E3 "Coyote Trapping"
programme.desc: The Fur Kickers are trying to get the coyote to take One Step too many and take a ride in the truck. They're sharing tips and tricks on how to catch a Wiley coyote

programme.title: Innerlocs Outthere S1:E3 "Bowfishing 101"
programme.desc: Corey and Camryn talk about their love for Bowfishing. Bowfishing 101 is full go tips, tactics and Action

programme.title: Innerlocs Outthere S1:E4 "Speedway Fun"
programme.desc: Corey meets up with some friends for the annual Kentucky Speedway Youth hunt. The deer are hotting the dirt form these youth hunters

programme.title: Reel West Coast S3:E3 "Huge Fish Dreams"
programme.desc: Dean from Sea Run Fly and Tackle joins Brendan on a quest for huge rainbow trout. Staying at the rustic cabins in Meadow Lake Fish Camp and with 14 different lakes to choose from they are on the hunt for a record catch.

programme.title: Reel West Coast S3:E4 "South To Cabo"
programme.desc: Brendan and friends head south to Cabo San Lucas to fish on Libertad, a new premier fishing charter that specializes in finding legendary marlin.

programme.title: Gale Force Twins S1:E3 "Bahamas Bottom Fishing – Yellowtails, Triggerfish And More"
programme.desc: Once again, the weather was NOT in our favor especially considering that we were fishing on an 18' flats boat! Not only was wind a factor....we were also running from those pesky summer storms that pop up UNANNOUNCED! Regardless of the conditions, we still managed to have some successful moments. We found a new fishing spot in the Bahamas! Now I guess we will have to go back when the weather ismore favorable. https://www.galeforcefishing.com

programme.title: Gale Force Twins S1:E4 "Explore A Bottomless Blue Hole - Chub Cay, Bahamas"
programme.desc: What better way to complete our trip to Chub Cay than to explore the local BLUE HOLE! Said to be around 800 ft deep and rumored to house GIANT SQUID, TIGER SHARKS AND GOLIATH GROUPERS this blue hole was a MUST DO. We showed up prepared with our camera's, mask and fins ready to explore this natural sink hole. The question is...WHAT DID WE FIND?? I guess you'll have to watch and find outfor yourselves... https://www.galeforcefishing.com

programme.title: TRP S4:E36 Chad Mendes & Chad Belding - UFC Legend & Successful Entrepreneur Team Up for Business Success
programme.desc: UFC legend Chad Mendes joins the podcast today. Throughout Chad’s UFC career he has been extremely vocal about his passion for hunting and fishing, so I naturally I am a big fan. He had me as a lifetime fan when I heard his tag line “The People’s Champ, Straight outta Deer Camp”. Chad Belding is Mendes’ business partner and he also joins the podcast today. Belding has a fascinating story of starting the brand BANDED and it’s rise to success following the lead of a couple of UFC brands. Mendes gives us his story of how he got started in the UFC, and what he has been pursuing lately. He just recently was on the Joe Rogan podcast to talk about a few of his businesses that he plays a huge role in, including a meat company, spice company, Finz and Featherz Guides, Peak meals, and more. Chad also shared news of his RETURN to the ring in the Bare Knuckle Fighting Championships. Be sure to check out everything that both of these guys are involved in at the links below: https://www.instagram.com/chadmendes/ https://www.instagram.com/finzandfeatherzguides/ https://thefowllife.com/

programme.title: Gale Force Twins S1:E5 "The Most Magical Bass Fishing Trip - Disney World"
programme.desc: After a very successful ICAST week we decided to spend a fun day fishing on the Magic Kingdom Lake with our Team Rainshadow family! We were very excited to teach our friend Eden how to bass fish and hopefully catch her first ever largemouth bass. Of course we had to spend some time fishing in front of the very famous shoe tree and then release our catches in front of Cinderella's castle for a happily ever after! https://www.galeforcefishing.com

programme.title: Storytellers S1:E1 "The Hill"
programme.desc: This is the story of how FE Hill ranch got it's start. From its inception, FE Hill has created opportunities for people to experience the outdoors and create memories. For us, it has created a tradition of Fathers and Sons hunting together.

programme.title: Road Trips S1:E3 "Cameraman Turned Bowhunter | Brown's Biggest Buck Ever"
programme.desc: Tyler Jordan and Bryan Brown have been playing cat and mouse with "Big Heavy" throughout their Nebraska trip. During some midday downtime, Brown wins a bet with Jordan on a 50-yard shot to earn himself the right to be in the hot seat. The guys continue making adjustments to get close to the buck. It results in Brown tagging his biggest buck ever.

programme.title: Road Trips S1:E4 "The Redemption Buck | Riley Green Goes Back to Nebraska"
programme.desc: Country music artist, Riley Green heads back to Nebraska to give it one last try on some of the target deer he was hunting a few weeks prior. It doesn’t take long before he has an opportunity at a big Nebraska shooter. Game on.

programme.title: Chasing November S5:E3 "Early October Trophy, Public Land Heart Break"
programme.desc: Justin Luebrecht uses a Frigid Forage green plot to tag a Missouri bully he calls "DT." Bill Winke encounters one of the best 4 year olds on the farm. Josh Sparks makes an aggressive move on the big public land 10. Jared Mills checks cameras and finds the Marino buck.

programme.title: Midwest Whitetail Offseason S14:E3 "Off-Beat Tips for November Success, Shed Hunting"
programme.desc: On this week's episode we start things off with Bill performing soil tests on the farm. He explains both how he does these tests and why it's important to do them to get the most out of your land. Next we join Drake Lamb who gives an update on a buck he presumed was dead. Finally, we join Jared Mills who updates us on some of the antlers he and Mike found on their river farm. He also covers a successful hunt from November of 2013, when he snuck in at midnight to hang a stand. Here is a link to the soil test kits: https://www.frigidforage.com/hot-buys/soil-test-kit/

programme.title: Midwest Whitetail Offseason S14:E4 "Breaking Down Two Hunts, Trail Camera Tips"
programme.desc: On this week's episode, we join Matt Thede in Iowa as he breaks down the three key points (the main one being trail camera tips) that he attributes to the successful harvest of his #1 buck this past fall. Next, Bill gives an update on some of the off-season equipment he's been trying, including shooting the Easton FMJ T64. Then we jump to Josh Sparks and Kaleb Greiner as they go into detail on their plan to get a shot at one of their target bucks using a new food plot. Finally, we join Mike Sawyer on another throwback late season hunt and discuss what led to Mike tagging another giant. Here's a link to the Easton FMJ T64 arrow: https://eastonarchery.com/arrows_/t64/ Here's a link to the Cuddelink Systems we use: https://www.cuddeback.com/cuddelink

programme.title: The Raven Project S1:E2 "Last Ditch Effort"
programme.desc: With everything breaking down Dustin and Randy head to an auction to hopefully save their weekend plans of getting seed into the ground.

programme.title: The Raven Project S1:E3 "We Got 99 Problems"
programme.desc: It seems that anything that can go wrong will go wrong on The Raven. Randy and Dustin are trying to beat the weather and get and the projects buttoned up before the September opener.

programme.title: Team200 S7:E3 "Kansas Whitetails"
programme.desc: Donnie Monroe chases big whitetails in Kansas.

programme.title: Struttinbuck S10:E3 "Arkansas Part 1"
programme.desc: Heath Graham and his family take their new piece of ground from cattle pastures to a whitetail hotspot. Gavin breaks the ice on opening day of bow season and them Heath keeps the ball rolling all year long.

programme.title: Tim Young - What World is This?
programme.desc: Tim headlines clubs all over North America, has performed on over 500 college campuses as well as comedy festivals in New York, Montreal, and Seattle, and he's a fixture in the New York City club scene. He was a finalist on NBCs Last Comic Standing, has appeared on Comedy Centrals Premium Blend, Tough Crowd, and Shorties, and you may have seen him as a commentator on VH1, MTV, TLC and the E! Channel.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Steve Mazan - Humblebragger
programme.desc: Steve Mazan shot out of the famous San Francisco scene that produced comedy legends such as Robin Williams and Dana Carvey. In his decade-plus career, Steve has done stand-up everywhere from clubs and colleges across the country to corporate events, cruises, and many television shows including The Late Show with David Letterman. He even won an Emmy for his work writing on The Ellen Degeneres Show. His clean and clever comedy landed him on Letterman, The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, The Bob & Tom Radio Show, Sirius/XM Radio and more. He’s even done audience warm-up for shows such as Deal or No Deal. But of all the performances Steve has done, he is most proud of his eight trips to Iraq and Afghanistan to perform for our troops. He’s also the subject of the award-winning film “Dying to do Letterman.”

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Shayne Smith - Alligator Boys
programme.desc: Stand-up comedian Shayne Smith delivers more stories about everything from a failed robbery to a wrestling match in the New York Subway and even saving the life of a dog in his second original Dry Bar Comedy special, “Alligator Boys."

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Kevin Bozeman - Clean and Unfiltered
programme.desc: In 1999, Kevin found himself in the real world with no real job skills and a strong desire to work an hour a day. What to do? Inspired by nights on the couch watching TV comedians, Kevin decided to head over to nearby Madison, WI and try the “Open-Mic Night”. Thirteen years later Kevin is still going on-stage, and he has found the job that fit his requirements. “For an hour a night I’m wildly successful”. With a smooth and clever style, a great smile and a contagious laugh Kevin has been entertaining in clubs and colleges across the country. In 2000 he was the winner of the Midwest region of the HBO “Comedy Competition” and flew to Los Angeles to compete as a finalist. He performed on Comedy Central’s “Premium Blend” in 2003, and finished 2nd in the Boston Comedy Competition in 2005. He was a semi-finalist on NBC’s “Last Comic Standing” in 2010. This past summer he co-starred in the Indie film “Flat Chested” starring Alicia Witt and Luke Perry. He currently resides in Chicago.

programme.title: Andy Erikson - Unicorn Style
programme.desc: Andy intertwines silly one-liners with whimsical stories in a playful but thought-provoking way.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Dennis Regan - Dennisland
programme.desc: The King Of Queens writer Dennis Regan comes swinging hard with his quick wit and flawless delivery. The laughs just keep on coming in "Dennisland".

programme.title: Kermit Apio - There's No I in Self Esteem
programme.desc: Born and raised in Honolulu, Hawaii, Kermet Apio enjoyed a childhood in paradise. He spent his time watching television, playing, and procrastinating everything else. To this day, he still does all three extensively. After graduating from high school, Kermet moved to Seattle to attend the University of Washington. Seattle became home. In early 1989, Kermet did his first open mike night at the Comedy Underground in Seattle. Comedy was a fun hobby. In May of 1990, he quit his job, said good bye to health care and benefits, and took the leap to performing full time. It is still his only job skill. He was the winner of the 2009 Great American Comedy Festival and has had numerous appearances on television and radio. He has showcased at comedy festivals in Aspen, Las Vegas, and Vancouver and has performed in 47 states and 3 Canadian provinces. He is a past winner of the Seattle Comedy Competition and was a semi-finalist in the San Francisco Comedy Competition. Also, in 1988 he was Dishwasher of the Month at the Sea-Tac Airport Dennyís. Kermet is married and the proud father of two wonderful children. He enjoys his family, baseball, and pie. He does not enjoy opera, sitting in traffic, and writing about himself in the third person.

programme.title: Chad Thornsberry - Junk-Cars & Valet Parking
programme.desc: Chad Thornsberry was born in St. Louis, MO. From an early age he learned his family was blessed, and blessed him with humor, quick wit, and a love of storytelling. Chad’s unique comedic perspective awards audience the opportunity to laugh at the common occurrences in everyday life. Often referred to as a great writer, his straightforward style allows audiences to laugh with him and at him as they find the humor in themselves. With reflections on growing up in a trailer park and observations as an English teacher, Chad’s satiric insights look at the pitfalls that make us human. With smart humor and a conversational style, Chad has delighted audiences from the trailer park, throughout the Midwest, and from coast to coast.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Russ Nagel - Uncle of Anarchy
programme.desc: Russ has become recognized in the entertainment industry for achieving more laughs per minute than any comedian working the circuit today and has also been seen on The Nashville Network, A&E's Comedy on the Road, Showtime's Comedy Club Network, the WB, Spike TV, Comedy Central and the list goes on and on. Being a 26+ year veteran of the comedy stage, Russ keeps the laughs coming fast and furious with an array of topics ranging from family and marriage, to travel and current events, and yes he even throws in some biker stuff too.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Jim Mccue - Nothing Personal
programme.desc: With his unique act, Jim keeps the audience on its toes. Volleying between set material and working the crowd, Jim cracks jokes with amazing timing and whip-like precision. A unique blend that is sure to leave the audience roaring with laughter!

programme.title: Moody Molavi - Remove Before Flight
programme.desc: The christian comic is married to his high school sweetheart, who later became his stepsister through the marriage of their parents to each other. That’s where the fun begins as Moody skillfully shares his life experiences.
